column3: str

Managingway seems to be mulling over music.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the laboring Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
Speak with the laboring Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.

<hex:0208F202D8E4E8050AFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF20281><hex:0208F2027BE4E8050BFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF20224><hex:0208F2021EE4E8050CFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF201C7><hex:0208F201C1E4E80509FF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF2016A><hex:0208F20164E4E8050DFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFF2010D><hex:0208F20107E4E8050EFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FFB3><hex:0208AFE4E8050FFF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FF5A><hex:020856E4E80510FF4E><hex:02084AE3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:04E806030203><hex:FF27>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806030203> to Managingway<hex:03><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
Considering the success of our musicking station, I do believe its equipment will require extra maintenance.
Can you imagine the glum disappointment that awaits us should our music fail to play during peak merriment? I shudder to even consider it.
I tasked one of our Ways with preparing spare parts for the audio apparatus. However, that was some time ago, with nary a whisper of their progress since.
Could I trouble you to lend them assistance? They are no doubt hard at work in Greatest Endsvale.
Have you come to help me? Oh, you are very nice. There are still so many pieces I must make and I've been making them for ever so long...
Like these metal parts for our amplifiers. Could you make some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.
Like these little parts for our speakers. Could you help with some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.
Like these delicate parts for our wiring. Could you make some of those? I have plenty of supplies here, if you need any more.
Once you're finished, go on ahead and take them to Managingway. I may be a while yet...
Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.
Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.
Did you run out of supplies? O-Oh, you were joking. Ha ha! ...Funny.
Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...
Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...
Did you run out of supplies? Goodness knows I've plenty to spare...
How fares our helper? Have they made progress with the spare parts?
Marvelous! With these pieces, I daresay our music will be free of malfunction for some time yet.
Originally, our audio apparatus was meant to broadcast Burrow-wide announcements for our guests, but as we no longer expect visitors from Etheirys, we repurposed the equipment.
Only time will tell if our musicking station's requirements exceed the capabilities of our apparatus...but in the meantime, we shall do our utmost to keep everything in working order.
I do hope you will assist us again, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. Please accept this small token of our appreciation.
